author: Corinne Ramey
title: Nanny Told Sister She ‘Heard Voices’ Before She Killed Children
text:
The former Manhattan nanny on trial for murder heard voices and seemed to be unraveling in the weeks before she stabbed her two young charges to death, her sister testified Tuesday. 
Delci Ortega, the older sibling of ex-nanny Yoselyn Ortega, said her once-cheerful sister became thin and depressed in the weeks before the Oct. 25, 2012, killings. Once, she said, Yoselyn woke up in the middle of the night and threw pots and pans.

“She...
